original_text:
Is there no balm in Gilead?
    Is there no physician there?
Why then is there no healing
    for the wound of my people?
korean_text: 길르앗에는 유향이 있지 아니한가 그 곳에는 의사가 있지 아니한가 딸 내 백성이 치료를 받지 못함은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: Is there no balm in Gilead?
Why then is there no healing
for the wound of my people?
